name: TrackDayR
storyline: TrackDayR (TDR) was born from the minds and aspirations of three guys, bounded by a decade of friendship and a strong passion for motorcycles and simulation games. We found ourselves dreaming about a new game that could combine those two passions, a new game on the market that could satisfy our thirst of innovation. Given our past working and gaming experiences, we decided to take matters into our own hands to create the motorcycle simulation game we always wished for.
summary: The motorcycle driving simulator that aims to reproduce the emotions of a trackday. Challenge your friends on TrackDayR and climb the leaderboards of players all over the world. TrackDayR, Trackday Everyday!
